Nikmati Vonis Bebas, Sofyan Basir Belum Berencana Gugat Balik KPK
04 Nov 2019, 16:52 by Marga Rahayu


Nikmati Vonis Bebas, Sofyan Basir Belum Berencana Gugat Balik KPK

KBRN, Jakarta : Kuasa hukum Sofyan Basir Heru Widodo menyatakan  hingga kini kliennya belum berencana untuk melakukan gugatan balik terhadap komisi pemberantasan korupsi (KPK).
hal ini menyusul vonis bebas yang Senin (4/11/2019) diputuskan Hakim Ketua Pengadilan Tipikor Jakarta Hariono dimana menyatakan Mantan Direktur Utama PT PLN Sofyan Basir tidak terbukti memfasilitasi pemberian suap dari pengusaha Johanes Budisutrisno Kotjo kepada mantan anggota DPR RI Eni Maulani Saragih dan mantan Menteri Sosial Idrus Marham.
Menurut Heru kliennya merasa bersyukur dengan  putusan ini sehingga untuk sementara waktu sofyan basir lebih memilih menikmati vonis bebas dan sama sekali belum memikirkan upaya menggugat balik KPK.
“Sampai dengan saat ini Pak Sofyan Basir masih proses keluar dari dalam tahanan saat ini masih diproses petikan dan sudah diproses. Setelah itu nanti Kami persihlahkan Pak Sofyan Basir menentukan langkah selanjutnya yang jelas Hari ini Pak Sofyan sangat bahagia”, ungkap Heru.
Lebih lanjut kuasa hukum Sofyan Basir Heru Widodo menyatakan vonis bebas ini menjadi pembelajaran bagi penegak hukum di Tanah Air agar menjunjung asas praduga tidak bersalah sebelum berhasil membuktikan tindak pidana korupsi seseorang.
“Belajar dari kasus vonis bebas Sofyan Basir satu hal yang perlu digaris bawahi agar penetapan tersangka korupsi tidak menggunakan voting tetapi menggunakan 2 alat bukti yang cukup karena asas praduga tak bersalah itu melekat kepada setiap orang yang ditetapkan sebagai tersangka”, lanjutnya.
Sofyan dinyatakan tidak terbukti melanggar pasal 12 huruf a juncto pasal 15 Undang-Undang Pemberantasan Tipikor juncto pasal 56 ke-2 KUHP dan pasal 11 juncto pasal 15 uu pemberantasan tipikor juncto pasal 56 ke-2 KUHP. sofyan disebut hakim tidak terlibat dalam kasus dugaan suap berkaitan dengan proses kesepakatan Proyek Independent Power Producer Pembangkit Listrik Tenaga Uap Mulut Tambang (IPP PLTU MT) Riau-1 antara PT Pembangkitan Jawa Bali Investasi (PJBI) dan blackgold natural resources (BNR) LTD dan China Huadian Engineering Company Limited (CHEC) LTD. Sofyan disebut tidak berperan membantu eni dalam menerima suap, bahkan dia juga diyakini tidak mengetahui pemberian suap Kotjo kepada Eni.

Enjoying a Free Verdict, Sofyan Basir has not planned to sue KPK
Nov 04 2019, 16:52 by Marga Rahayu


Enjoying a Free Verdict, Sofyan Basir has not planned to sue KPK

KBRN, Jakarta: Sofyan Basir's attorney, Heru Widodo, said that until now his client has not planned to file a counter-action against the Corruption Eradication Commission (KPK).
This follows the acquittal which Monday (4/11/2019) was decided by the Chief Judge of the Jakarta Corruption Court Hariono which stated that the Former Managing Director of PT PLN Sofyan Basir was not proven to facilitate giving bribes from businessman Johanes Budisutrisno Kotjo to former DPR RI member Eni Maulani Saragih and former Social Minister Idrus Marham.
According to Heru, his client felt grateful for this decision, so for a while Sofyan Basir preferred to enjoy a free verdict and had not yet thought about efforts to sue the KPK.
"Until now, Mr. Sofyan Basir is still in the process of getting out of custody while the passage is still being processed and has been processed. After that we will present Mr. Sofyan Basir to determine the next clear step. Today Mr. Sofyan is very happy, "Heru said.
Furthermore, Sofyan Basir's attorney, Heru Widodo, stated that the free sentence was a lesson for law enforcers in the country to uphold the presumption of innocence before successfully proving someone's corruption.
"Learning from Sofyan Basir's case that is one thing that needs to be underlined so that the determination of corruption suspects does not use voting but uses 2 sufficient evidence because the principle of presumption of innocence is attached to everyone who is determined as a suspect", he continued.
Sofyan was declared not proven to have violated article 12 letter a juncto article 15 of the Law on the Eradication of Corruption in conjunction with article 56 of the 2nd KUHP and article 11 juncto article 15 of the eradication of corruption in juncto article 56 of the 2 KUHP. Sofyan said that the judge was not involved in the alleged bribery case in connection with the agreement process of the Independent Power Producer Project of the Riau Mouth Steam Power Plant (IPP PLTU MT) Riau-1 between PT Generation Java Bali Investment (PJBI) and blackgold natural resources (BNR) LTD and China Huadian Engineering Company Limited (CHEC) LTD. Sofyan is said to have no role in assisting Eni in accepting bribes, even he is also believed to be unaware of the giving of Kotjo's bribes to Eni.
